diff_act: 1.Forward temperatures within the normal range for further processing.

regen.absent_element: Situation for handling temperatures within normal range
regen.new_specification: If LO ≤ T ≤ UO, the THEMAS system shall forward the reported temperature for subsequent processing without indicating an overtemperature condition.

regen.absent_element: absence of specification for handling normal temperatures
regen.new_specification: The THEMAS system shall output temperatures that do not exceed the overtemperature limits for further processing.

regen.absent_element: handling of temperatures not exceeding overtemperature limits
regen.new_specification: The THEMAS system shall output temperatures not exceeding the temperature limits for further processing.

label: If LO<=T<=UO then the THEMAS system shall recognize the temperature limit has not been exceeded, then this process shall output the temperature status
absence: situation of temperatures within the limits
